Articles.Content:
Just reposting this since the earlier thread was accidentally deleted.

I made a printable sheet for all science Kerbin points. Print it and check the boxes when you've completed the experiment.

Kerbin:

https://www.dropbox.com/s/646yyjqw0y4gmf8/KSP_SCIENCE_KERBIN.pdf

Mun:

https://www.dropbox.com/s/cwqhhz9d8wy9cd1/KSP_SCIENCE_MUN.pdf

Excel Sheet:

https://www.dropbox.com/s/0p8o8wbjd05t4q0/KSP_SCIENCE.xls

Thanks Lahha. Been thinking of compiling those myself, those are really needed (wish they were built into the game. So far I just keep a notebook with those. I'll check yours out, will probably use them from now on. Even though nothing beats a notebook and lead pencil, a ready form is always nice : )

Thank you!
